channel.title: Phys rezzing Possessor's original body - Breaks the game for Poss
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I was Posessor, got poisoned so I jumped bodies from 1->15. After I died, the Phys somehow rezz'd my **NEUTRAL** Poss body (1) into a Death Knight. After that happened, I lost **ALL** my abilities as a Poss and had **NO** night abilities whatsoever. During the nights where I was a Poss with no abilities in the body of 15, I could also see the Death Knight (1) standing behind me in my room. I was then poisoned again, and died due to the poison which I assume shouldn't have happened because of Poss death immunity at night.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Phys shouldn't have been able to Rez 1, I should of kept my abilities in my new body (15), and I assume shouldn't have died from the poison?
#### Steps to reproduce:
Attempt to get a phys to rez the Poss' original neutral body.
#### Comments:
Dis shit was broke.

item.title: Phys rezzing Possessor's original body - Breaks the game for Poss
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
So I won’t be surprising that one of the dead suddenly become vote-able

I think this is what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Phys rezzing Possessor's original body - Breaks the game for Poss
item.dc:creator: Zizzs
item.description:
I am bumping this thread because this happened to me again today. I was Poss and jumped 3 different times throughout the game. There was a phys in the game that rez’d a DK (One of my old bodies), and it ended up removing my abilities again and making me lose the game.

This needs to be fixed, please.

Read full topic

item.source: Phys rezzing Possessor's original body - Breaks the game for Poss

item.title: Phys rezzing Possessor's original body - Breaks the game for Poss
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
death immunity is bypassed by bleeding, poisoning, execution by prince, knights guarding, bears from hunters, reapers who consumer darkness, etc.

Come to think of it, a lot of classes bypass death immunity…

Read full topic
item.source: Phys rezzing Possessor's original body - Breaks the game for Poss

item.title: Phys rezzing Possessor's original body - Breaks the game for Poss
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
Death immunity doesn’t count poison, but everything else is definitely a bug
